name: Dice Platformer
description:
This is a platformer where you play as a stack of poker chips in an environment made out of 6-sided dice. This is extremely creative, considering the theme was 'Roll of the dice'. When you start the game, the set of levels and their color is chosen randomly so every time you start a game it looks completely different.

Controls: move with arrow keys and jump with Z

Known issues: jump animation plays when rubbing against a wall
